nl.renarj.jasdb.api.model

Interface DBInstanceFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBInstanceFactoryImpl

    public interface DBInstanceFactory
    The DBInstanceFactory manages all active and configured database instances

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInstance(String instanceId, String path)
      Adds a new instance with default configuration with a specified database path
      void deleteInstance(String instanceId)
      Deletes an instance and all of its resources, this operation is destructive and will remove all data permanently.
      DBInstance getInstance()
      Gets the default Database instance
      DBInstance getInstance(String instanceName)
      Gets the instance for the specified instance id
      boolean hasInstance(String instanceId)
      Returns wether an instanceId exists or not
      List<DBInstance> listInstances()
      Retrieves a list of all the instances configured
      void shutdown()
      Does a shutdown of all the instances

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        DBInstance getInstance()
                       throws ConfigurationException
        Gets the default Database instance
        Returns:
        The default database instance
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If unable to configure

      • getInstance

        DBInstance getInstance(String instanceName)
                       throws ConfigurationException
        Gets the instance for the specified instance id
        Parameters:
        instanceName - The name of the instance
        Returns:
        The instance specified, or null if does not exist
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If unable to load the instance

      • hasInstance

        boolean hasInstance(String instanceId)
        Returns wether an instanceId exists or not
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instanceId to check for
        Returns:
        True if the instance exists, False if not

      • listInstances

        List<DBInstance> listInstances()
        Retrieves a list of all the instances configured
        Returns:
        The list of all the instances

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
              throws ConfigurationException
        Does a shutdown of all the instances
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException

      • addInstance

        void addInstance(String instanceId,
               String path)
                 throws JasDBStorageException
        Adds a new instance with default configuration with a specified database path
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instanceId
        path - The path where the database is located
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If unable to configure the instance
        JasDBStorageException

      • deleteInstance

        void deleteInstance(String instanceId)
                    throws JasDBStorageException
        Deletes an instance and all of its resources, this operation is destructive and will remove all data permanently.
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instance id to delete all resources for
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If unable to remove the instance
        JasDBStorageException
